actions.description: +2 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 2 (1d4) piercing damage plus 3 lightning damage.
actions.name: Pincer

conditionImmunities: blinded, charmed, deafened, exhaustion, frightened, paralyzed, petrified, poisoned
name: Vox Seeker
senses: Blindsight 60ft (Blind beyond this radius), Passive Perception 10

specialTraits.description: The vox seeker must move toward and attack the source of the nearest voice within 60 feet of it, to the exclusion of all other targets, for as long as it remains operational.
specialTraits.name: Voice Lock

specialTraits.description: The vox seeker can climb difficult surfaces, including upside down on ceilings, without needing to make an ability check.
specialTraits.name: Spider Climb
